feed.title: RomM Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.2.0
entry.content:
BIOS file support

We've added the ability to mount (or upload) your BIOS/firmware files for any of the supported platforms. On top of that, when playing in browser with our EmulatorJS integration, you'll now be able to select both a BIOS file to load, and a core (when the system supports more then 1 core). Refer to the EmulatorJS for the complete list of available cores for each system.

Sharable & private notes

When viewing a game, you might notice a new tab called "Notes"; this is your notepad, a blank space to jot down just about anything. With full Markdown support, you have complete control over the style and layout of your note. You're also able to make the note "public" (using the little eye icon next to the pencil), that is visible to every logged-in user on your instance. And if they do the same, you'll get access to their note, for easy sharing of tips and tricks.

||| |---|---| |||

Performance improvements

On collections of 1000+ games/platforms with 250+ roms, we've measured a 10x to 20x improvement in load times. RomM should now feel faster regardless of the size of your collection, with smoother gallery navigation, faster loading of games on scroll, and real pagination support in the list view.

What's Changed

  • Games notes by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/828
  • Copy download link dialog by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/846
  • Firmware/BIOS support by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/830
  • Upgraded front packages and adapted code by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/847
  • Python package changes by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/844
  • Fixed gallery play button for not supported platforms by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/848
  • Fixed updating user images and ignore firmware files based on config by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/851
  • Purge platforms correctly on scan by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/858
  • Ruff-only pre-commit hooks by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/855
  • Added amiibo platform icon by @Casuallynoted in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/869
  • Fixed emulatorjs game loading when game have non-ascii characters in the name by @vincywindy in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/872
  • Fix search by ID for mobygames by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/863
  • Platform fetch performance improvements by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/857
  • Fixed uploading images for roms and users by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/874
  • Fixed rom download by @vincywindy in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/876
  • Improved general performance (10x faster load at home page and galleries) by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/875
  • Fixed scan view selectors by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/878
  • Whats new link fixed by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/880
  • Only scan platform when selected by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/882
  • Improved performance of Rom DB fetch by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/883

New Contributors

  • @vincywindy made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/872
  • @Deekerman a special shoutout for being a right PITA

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI complete redesign by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/934
  • Covers are now fetch in their 1080p version by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/934
  • Now sibling roms can have different covers by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/934
  • Screenshots are fetch in their big version by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/934
  • Setup wizard added for new RomM installations by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/976
  • Added collections by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/964
  • Add favourites collection as special collection by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/977
  • SteamGridDB integration. Roms and collections can be edited with a SteamGridDB cover by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/960
  • Enhanced scan logs by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/965
  • Select main sibling added for merged roms in gallery by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/963
  • Allow users to edit their own profile by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/975
  • Fixed firmware drawer permissions by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/956
  • Added total filesize endpoint by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/969
  • Improved Docker image size by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/947
  • Install redis instead of building in Dockerfile by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/945
  • Fix section links and improve grammar/spelling in README.md by @TylerVigario in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/914
  • Add trunk.io checks by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/868
  • Add parallel-n64 to cores by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/923
  • Use core icon when showing version by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/922
  • Add interactive table of contents by @Nicmorris1820 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/924
  • Added linuxserver/mariadb as alternative by @need4swede in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/926
  • Added large carousel on screnshot click by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/932
  • Resources structure migrated from resources/{platform_slug}/{rom_name} to resources/roms/{platform_id}/{rom_id}.
  • Disabled zip compression on streaming multi-file download to increase speed by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/983
  • Prevent mass-purging of roms during scan if filesystem is not correctly mounted by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/987
  • Fixed abort scan by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1004
  • Added support for any kind of image extension on custom covers by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1002
  • Fixes and improvements everywhere

New Contributors

  • @adamantike made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/947
  • @TylerVigario made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/914
  • @Nicmorris1820 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/924
  • @need4swede made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/926
  • @lepture made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/931

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.2.0...3.3.0

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Added link to home button by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1054
  • feat: Public collections by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1028
  • feat: Added aditional platform icons by @Casuallynoted in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1038
  • feat: Store and re-use last saved bios/save/state/core by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1037
  • feat: Clickable filter buttons on details view by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1040
  • feat: Add button to show duplicates by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1043
  • fix: Scanning selected roms by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1042
  • fix: Use namespaced cookie for session by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1009
  • fix: Replace game-and-watch with g-and-w by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1026
  • fix: Backend URL redirection logic by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1058
  • fix: Enable flake8-async rules in ruff and fix warnings by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1030
  • fix: Initialize context on scheduled task by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1033
  • fix: Return early if IGDB finds an exact match by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1032
  • fix: CSRF token issues by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1057
  • fix: Link from related games by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1045
  • fix: Typos in frontend by @HellLord77 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1048
  • fix: Firmware pagination by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1041
  • fix: Multi-file download in gallery view by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1044
  • fix: Remove persistent overlay prevents back navigation by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1036
  • misc: Add Redis async cache by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1010
  • misc: Create config.batocera-retrobat.yml by @TyroneSlothrop in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1013
  • misc: Migrate MobyGamesHandler to async by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1011
  • misc: Migrate filesystem resource handler to async by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1017
  • misc: Replace pytest-vcr dependency with pytest-recording by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1021
  • misc: Refactor scan process by splitting single function by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1024
  • misc: Migrate IGDBBaseHandler to async by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1023
  • misc: Use PYTEST_VERSION variable to detect Pytest runs by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1034
  • misc: Use async interface for stream-zip by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1035
  • misc: Add workflow that runs typecheck on PRs by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1055
  • misc: Make backend handle URLs with trailing slash by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1059
  • misc: Drop ROMM_AUTH_USERNAME and ROMM_AUTH_PASSWORD env variables by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1060

New Contributors

  • @TyroneSlothrop made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1013

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.3.0...3.4.0

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.5.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT] If your games or collections fail to load on restart, wait 10 minutes, then run a QUICK scan from the scan page.

What's Changed

  • misc: Improve typing for feed schemas by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1064
  • [ROMM-1063] Add Amiga CD32 to emulatorjs game list by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1065
  • fix: fab overlay fixed by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1073
  • fix: Readable setup text on white theme by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1072
  • fix: Allow access to Tinfoil feed when download auth is disabled by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1078
  • fix: Set Gunicorn option forwarded-allow-ips by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1077
  • Improve speed of fetching siblings for roms by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1076
  • Ruffle flash emulator by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1049
  • Calculate and store hashes for rom files by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1005
  • Hotfix scans when running HASH_SCAN by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1081
  • Fix playing emulatorjs + better platform icon loading by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1086
  • Fix home icon size on safari/ios by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1088
  • misc: Upgrade Python to v3.12 and Alpine to v3.20 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1092
  • feat: Use X-Accel-Redirect to improve file download speed by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1084
  • misc: Pin Node version to v20 by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1095
  • Add icon to gallery header for current platform by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1093
  • Upload progress bars by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1096
  • Skip compressed files if theyre invalid by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1097
  • Bump emulatorjs to 4.1.1 by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1100
  • feat: Use nginx mod_zip to generate multi-file zip downloads by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1102
  • misc: Use single SQLAlchemy engine and session maker by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1105
  • Switch funding to open collective by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1108
  • Replace illegal fs chars in filenames by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1109
  • Upload dialog hotfixed + clear button by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1118
  • Fix detecting if platform is flash games by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1120
  • feat(UX) - Allow links to open in a new tab by @SaraVieira in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1116
  • fix(icons) - match icon names to platform names by @SaraVieira in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1122
  • Disable auth on rom content get endpoint when env variable is present by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1125
  • Add support for formatting vuejs with trunk by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1124
  • Add known bios files from retropie project by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1126
  • Add titledb field to tinfoil response by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1127
  • Better performance for large collections by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1128
  • [ROMM-1113] Add file path in rom edit window by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1129
  • misc: Tag Docker image with major version only by @adamantike in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1131
  • build(deps): bump axios from 1.6.8 to 1.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1132
  • Bump axios to 1.7.4 by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1134
  • [ROMM-1107] Add env variable to disable in-browser emulation by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1133
  • Default both fast forward and rewind to enabled by @SaraVieira in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1136
  • Allow user to unmatch rom by @SaraVieira in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1138

New Contributors

  • @SaraVieira made their first contribution in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1116

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.4.0...3.5.0

entry.title: New release for RomM: v3.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Hack to get emujs working in dev mode by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1139
  • Microfixes to game cards UI by @zurdi15 in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1144
  • [ROMM-1150] Fix multi select in table view by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1151
  • [ROMM-1123] Limit returned roms to 2500 by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1149
  • [ROMM-1155] Patch zipfil + catch more 7zip errors by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1156
  • [ROMM-1154] Fix setting main sibling by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1157
  • Remove unraid template by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1161
  • build(deps): bump cryptography from 42.0.8 to 43.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1164
  • [ROMM-1153] Use generated pack of favicons by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1159
  • [ROMM-1165] set docs and recod paths by @gantoine in https://github.com/rommapp/romm/pull/1166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rommapp/romm/compare/3.5.0...3.5.1
